Package de.mrapp.android.adapter.decorator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDecorator
    An abstract base class for all decorators, which should allow to customize the appearance of the view, which is used to visualize the items of an adapter.
    AbstractExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType>
    An abstract base class for all decorators, which should allow to customize the appearance of the view, which is used to visualize the items of a ExpandableListAdapter, SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter or MultipleChoiceExpandableListAdapter.
    AbstractListDecorator<DataType>
    An abstract base class for all decorators, which should allow to customize the appearance of the view, which is used to visualize the items of a ListAdapter, SingleChoiceListAdapter or MultipleChoiceListAdapter.
    ViewHolder
    A view holder, which provides references to previously referenced views in order to reuse them.
